answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some documents you might find helpful.
This is the Qualifications-Based Selection Manual for the state of Ohio.
http://associationdatabase.com/aws/ACEC/asset_manager/get_file/9097/qbsmanual.pdf
I found a similar manual from New Mexico.
http://www.nmenv.state.nm.us/cpb/PTAB_Manual%20Rev%2005-24-06.pdf
Indiana has website dedicated to their Qualifications-Based Selection system.
http://www.qbsindiana.org/
The Associate General Contractors of America also released a report on Qualifications-Based Selection which I have included below.
http://www.agc.org/galleries/projectd/Qualifications%20Based%20Selection%20of%20Contractors%20FINAL.PDF
This article from the Missouri Municipal League discusses the benefits of using a Qualifications-Based Selection system.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document//1596
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

text: How does your community manage the qualifications-based selection process?  Who reviews proposals?  Also, if you have an ordinance or policy you can share, please email it to me at justin.brugger@cityoffortwayne.org.  Thanks!
